casebody.data:
GAILEY
v.
TRIANGLE BILLIARDS, et al. No. 611P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Jerry B. Grimes, Lexington, for Triangle Billiards, et al.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 635 S.E.2d 482.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of December 2006 by Plaintiff to dismiss "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
